resources.string:
Hi, my name is Odalys Martinez-Villa. 

 I am 19 years old and I attend FGCU and I am majoring in Software Engineering. 

 I was born at the hospital in Fort Myers Florida and I have lived my whole life at Labelle, Florida. I live with both my parents and I have a younger brother who is 17 and still attending high school. I have 4 cats, and one wild cat that just chills at my house and eats along with my other cats. 

 During my free time I like to hang out with my friends either by going shopping, eating, or having bonfires at my house. 

 I have recently developed a hobby of couponing and I am a little obsessed. I think that it is fun trying to pay the lowest total possible and my favorite stores to coupon is at Walgreens, Dollar General, and Family Dollar. I will never pay full price again for items that I can get free or nearly free. 

 Some personal facts about me is that my favorite color is orange, I love and embrace my Mexican culture, especially music. I love to watch Riverdale and Grey's Anatomy and I enjoy dancing and spending time with my family. 

 Thanks for viewing this little app. Enjoy!
